message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal for both of us, as it's well below the value it holds to me and still allows you a substantial profit.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000 for your product. I believe this is a fair compromise between its value to you and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,350,000. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product to me.  Let's find a way to make this work.

I've reviewed your latest offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I'd like to propose a price of $1,325,000. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise that respects the value of the product to you while staying within my budget.
